name: Uplevel
summary: Uplevel, a series-A startup hatched at Madrona Venture Labs, hired me to stand up a greenfield React SPA web app for its engineering  effectiveness dashboard. On the path to product/market fit, I have created two different greenfield SPAs to support the product.
contributions: Led front-end development of two different React SPA (create-react-app and vite) webapps delivering effectiveness dashboards for software engineering organizations, including Fortune 100 companies.

Developed a hackathon project that was integrated into the production app: a robust query parameters utility that enabled flexible sharing of UI state for customer data visibility and greater efficiency during QA cycles.
Led/anchored feature initiatives for the development team, serving as liaison to PMs; documenting and maintaining technical requirements; shepherding development calendar.
Worked closely with PMs and design to negotiate and document technical requirements.
Led front-end engineering efforts on error handling and monitoring.
Led front-end engineering efforts on i18n and l10n.
